name: Barcelona Secret Party
description:
Start parties in the buzzing Barcelona night.

Move around with WASD/input keys.

Avoid the police, they can hear you from a few blocks away.

Enter a building to shake them up.

Try to start as many parties as you can without getting caught.

Made for Ludum Dare 41: "Combine two incompatible genres".

The web version may have performance and input issues.
